experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: Completed a project on Segmentation & Penetration of mobile banking adoption. In this project, customers were segmented as users & non users and then a survey was conducted to record the responses of users about various important variables which plays a significant role in using mobile banking by customers. Responses collected for various variable from a selected sample of users were analyzed using SAS & Microsoft Excel to find out factors out of collected data.Results obtained from analysis were used to formulate the promotional & awareness strategy to increase penetration of mobile banking application.
experience.description_html: Completed a project on Segmentation & Penetration of mobile banking adoption. In this project, customers were segmented as users & non users and then a survey was conducted to record the responses of users about various important variables which plays a significant role in using mobile banking by customers. Responses collected for various variable from a selected sample of users were analyzed using SAS & Microsoft Excel to find out factors out of collected data.Results obtained from analysis were used to formulate the promotional & awareness strategy to increase penetration of mobile banking application.
